aboutRegister: This is a fictional, non-commercial project developed solely for demonstration purposes. Your privacy is important to us, and we do not process any real personal data. By registering, you will create a test account to explore the features of our prototype. No real transactions or financial operations take place, and no sensitive information is processed. You are free to browse and test the functionalities. This prototype is for educational and illustrative purposes only. It is not a real banking service and does not offer financial products.
loginError: An error occurred while trying to login.
transferToSelforInsufficientBalance: You cannot transfer to yourself or your balance is insufficient.
aboutLoans: All loan data is fictional and does not represent real financial products. The data is randomly generated and does not reflect any real-world information. You can simulate loans to test the functionality of our prototype. No real transactions or financial operations take place, and no sensitive information is processed. This prototype is for educational and illustrative purposes only. It is not a real banking service and does not offer financial products
insufficientBalance: Insufficient balance to request this loan.
stockQuantity: Please choose a quantity of stocks.
aboutStocks: All stock data is fictional and does not represent real companies or financial products. The data is randomly generated and does not reflect any real-world information. You can buy and sell stocks to test the functionality of our prototype. No real transactions or financial operations take place, and no sensitive information is processed. This prototype is for educational and illustrative purposes only. It is not a real banking service and does not offer financial products.
samePassword: New password must be different from the old one.
alertBalance: *This new value will be overwritten to your current balance.
aboutDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All your data will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone, and you will lose all your information.
